content: *i am woman i am fearless i am sexy i m divine i m unbeatable i m creative honey you can get in line only love can get inside me i move in my own timing voice of the future speak to me kindly i feel what i want and somehow it finds me ~ amy meli* this free twisted cabled beanie is a gift from me to you to all you powerful creatures and beautiful souls i hope each stitch empowers you **size** one size to fit head circumference 52 - 56 cm/20 5 - 22 length from picot edge to top about 25 cm/10 **yarn** 1 skein of goya merino by cecily grove yarns 100% merino 400m/439y per 100 grams shown in color nocturne 1 skein of drops kid-silk by garnstudio 75% kid mohair 25% silk 210m/229y per 25g shown in colorway 37 north sea **needles** 4 0 mm/us #6 circular needle at least 40 cm/16 long and dpns or appropriate size to get gauge 3 5 mm/us #4 circular needles at least 40 cm/16 long or dpns or two sizes smaller than gauge needles **other** stitch marker tapestry needle **gauge** 22 sts x 28 rnds over 10 cm/4 in twisted cable pattern worked in the round with needle 4 0 mm/us #6 with 1 strand of each yarn held together take time to save time check your gauge
